Package DAO

Class CustomerDao

  • java.lang.Object
    • DAO.CustomerDao
  • public class CustomerDao
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the data access utility for the Customer class.

      static void removeCustomerAppointment​(Appointment appointment)
      removeCustomerAppointment method - performs an SQL delete statement that removes a customer's appointment (used for the deleting of a customer record).

      removeCustomerFromDB method - performs an SQL delete statement to remove a Customer from the database.

      selectAllCustomerAppointments method - performs an SQL select statement that sets the customerAppointments ObservableList with data from the database.

      selectAllCustomers method - performs a select SQL statement that sets the customers ObservableList with data from the database.
